short_summary: Repairs and Installation of various types of fences and highway guide rails on various locations of CFB Halifax.
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Work under this requirement comprises the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform repairs and installation of various types of fences and highway guide rails at various locations of CFB Halifax.
duration_in_months: It is anticipated that the contract will be awarded in approximately 1 month and take up to 6 months to complete.
full_summary:
# RISO Fence Repairs and Installations
## Tender Number: WS3773487578

**Pubication Date**: 
*English*: December 1, 2022 
*French*: 1er décembre 2022

**Closing Date for Tender:**
*English*: January 11, 2023, 2:00 p.m. local time
*French*: 11 janvier 2023, 14h heures heure locale

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking offers from qualified Offerors to provide structural steel erection services, building site preparation services, and specialty building and trades services for repairs and installations of various types of fences and highway guide rails at various locations of CFB Halifax.

## Bidding Requirements

* **Tender Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and several other trade agreements.

## Contracting and End User Entities

The contracting and end-user entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## Contact Information

Alexander Russell of the Department of Public Works and Government Services is the contact person for this tender.

* **Contact Information**: 
*Alexander russell's email*: alex.russell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*Alexander russell's phone (optional)*: 
*Alexander russell's fax (optional)*:
